properties.entry: SELECT SEND_ID FROM FOLLOW_REQUEST WHERE SEND_ID= ? AND RESPONSE_ID= ?
UPDATE FOLLOW_REQUEST SET REQUEST_STATUS='Y' WHERE RESPONSE_ID = ? AND SEND_ID = ?
INSERT INTO FOLLOW_REQUEST ( SEND_ID , RESPONSE_ID ) VALUES ( ? , ? )
SELECT MEM_ID, MEM_NAME, MEM_INTRO, MEM_NICK FROM MEMBER M, FOLLOW_REQUEST WHERE M.MEM_ID = SEND_ID AND RESPONSE_ID = ? AND REQUEST_STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE FOLLOW_REQUEST SET REQUEST_STATUS='N' WHERE RESPONSE_ID = ? AND SEND_ID = ?
